How does the RIVIA assay measure the deg: By measuring changes in electrical impedance.
What characteristic of nanobodies allows: Their small size and unique structure.
Their ability to form multivalent complexes.
Their higher affinity for viral proteins.
What is the primary advantage of the RIV: RIVIA can be completed in less than 1.5 hours without the need for BSL-2 or BSL-3 facilities.
RIVIA requires fewer reagents and is less expensive to perform.
RIVIA provides more detailed structural information about antibody binding.
RIVIA can detect a wider range of viral variants than traditional assays.
